data.eml:eml: Definition of the European Lepidocyrtus curvicollis group (Collembola: Entomobryidae) with description of a new species from Sardinia (Italy)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mateos, Eduardo, Petersen, Henning (2012): Definition of the European Lepidocyrtus curvicollis group (Collembola: Entomobryidae) with description of a new species from Sardinia (Italy). Zootaxa 3273: 51-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280819
